content.html: To expound slightly: I don’t actually know the answer, but to reduce it down to two options, either being plural is “valid” in which case plural folks need love and support, or it’s a form of illness, in which case plural folks need love and support. It’s just that simple.
content.value:
To expound slightly:
I don’t actually know the answer, but to reduce it down to two options, either being plural is “valid” in which case plural folks need love and support, or it’s a form of illness, in which case plural folks need love and support. It’s just that simple.
